about_the_game:
▉《Travel cat : Adventure Island》has a Japanese illustration style and rich object design.



This is a comprehensive game that allows you to happily plant trees, vegetables, and a variety of strange plants in an island farm simulation. When you first enter the game, the island will randomly generate types, but if you like more lighting, green spaces, or golden grasslands, the game can completely and unlimitedly generate new maps until you find your dream home. In the map, you can freely design and arrange every inch of land you step on, do various planning and arrangement that you like, plant flowers or crops, build your own small house, decorate with various furniture, and even raise cute cats.

▉《Travel cat : Adventure Island》 Artfully designed special modeling trees.



The game provides a supply shop where players can exchange and purchase items, seeds, furniture, and household items as long as they have the corresponding resources and currency. The trees are adorned with roasty toasty cotton candy, mushroom covered in gold coins, and ice cream trees, among others. The diverse and unique plants will surprise you on your journey of exploration!

▉《Travel cat : Adventure Island》Cute animal night market stalls



Do you like the feeling of your island being empty and not alive? Players can design the island into their own island night market feeling, the game currently provides nearly 20 kinds of cute animal booths waiting for players to unlock, they will be able to help players earn money, even if the player shut down the game, until the next online, you can still go to each booth one by one to collect money, to experience the feeling of being a small animal boss.

▉《Travel cat : Adventure Island》generate their own island



This is a comprehensive game that island farm simulation. Players will have their own player island to design and arrange, and can build buildings, raise pets, grow vegetables and arrange furniture on the island.



▉《Travel cat : Adventure Island》Steam Cloud

The game supports with Steam Cloud cloud archive backup service, players hard work to design the island layout, after each off game will be safely backed up to the cloud, do not have to worry about the loss of small island archives.

▉《Travel cat : Adventure Island》Players can zoom the map to see their own island

Can't see the whole picture of your own island? Press Ctrl + Mouse UP/Mouse Down to zoom in and zoom out the map freely.



▉《Travel cat : Adventure Island》Official Discord~
Welcome to join the official DISCORD to report any comments or bugs :

name: 《Travel cat : Adventure Island》旅行貓貓~探險之島

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 610
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1030
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space

short_description: 《Cat Ｘ Island Ｘ Farm Life》 Build your farm island, Grow crops and animals, Explore the island , Mining for Gold and Minerals , Gather resources , Exchange furniture.
